claim.text: EUREKA achieves human-level performance on reward design across a diverse suite of 29 open-sourced RL environments that include 10 distinct robot morphologies.
claim.exact_quote: EUREKA achieves human-level performance on reward design across a diverse suite of 29 open-sourced RL environments that include 10 distinct robot morphologies, including quadruped, quadcopter, biped, manipulator, as well as several dexterous hands; see Fig. 1.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA achieves human-level performance on reward design across a diverse suite of 29 open-sourced RL environments that include 10 distinct robot morphologies.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA achieves human-level performance on reward design across a diverse suite of 29 open-sourced RL environments that include 10 distinct robot morphologies.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA autonomously generates rewards that outperform expert human rewards on 83% of the tasks and realizes an average normalized improvement of 52%.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA autonomously generates rewards that outperform expert human rewards on 83% of the tasks and realizes an average normalized improvement of 52%.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA solves dexterous manipulation tasks that were previously not feasible by manual reward engineering.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA solves dexterous manipulation tasks that were previously not feasible by manual reward engineering.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA enables a new gradient-free in-context learning approach to reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF).
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA enables a new gradient-free in-context learning approach to reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF).

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA can incorporate human reward functions and improve upon them.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA can incorporate human reward functions and improve upon them.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA can generate free-form, expressive reward programs that significantly outperform task-specific prompting or pre-defined reward templates.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA can generate free-form, expressive reward programs that significantly outperform task-specific prompting or pre-defined reward templates.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA's evolutionary search is indispensable for its final performance.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA's evolutionary search is indispensable for its final performance.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA can generate weakly correlated reward functions that outperform human ones, indicating the discovery of novel reward design principles.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA can generate weakly correlated reward functions that outperform human ones, indicating the discovery of novel reward design principles.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA can significantly improve over human rewards even when they are highly sub-optimal.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA can significantly improve over human rewards even when they are highly sub-optimal.

evidence.evidence_text: EUREKA can incorporate human reward initialization and textual feedback to better steer its reward generation.
evidence.exact_quote: EUREKA can incorporate human reward initialization and textual feedback to better steer its reward generation.
